byline.contributor: Rami Nazzal contributed reporting from Ramallah, West Bank.
byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and IRIT PAZNER GARSHOWITZ

abstract: Palestinian officials say Israeli forces killed one teenager and wounded four others after opening fire on car in West Bank; Israeli military is investigating incident; shooting comes during trial of Israeli soldier Elor Azaria, who is charged with manslaughter in killing of Palestinian in Hebron.
lead_paragraph: One teenager died and four were wounded, and they appeared to be innocent bystanders who were hit while the military tried to halt Palestinians who were throwing stones and firebombs.

headline.main: Palestinian, 15, Killed as Israeli Forces Sought to Halt Stone Throwing
headline.print_headline: Palestinian, 15, Is Killed by Israeli Forces Firing at Stone Throwers

snippet: One teenager died and four were wounded, and they appeared to be innocent bystanders who were hit while the military tried to halt Palestinians who were throwing stones and firebombs.
